number.greater_than: The number must be greater than {{base}}
number.greater_than_or_equal: The number must be greater than or equal to {{base}}
number.lower_than: The number must be lower than {{base}}
number.lower_than_or_equal: The number must be lower than or equal to {{base}}

date.invalid: The date is invalid, please use 'mm/dd/aaaa'

text.longer_than: Text must have more than {{base}} characters
text.shorter_than: Text must have less than {{base}} characters

error.required: It looks like you forgot to fill this one out.
error.tooShort: Too short. Must be at least {{minLength}} characters.
error.tooLong: Too long. Must be at most {{maxLength}} characters.
error.alreadyTaken: This one is already taken. Please, Try another.
error.notMember: This user is not a member.
error.accountNotFound: Account not found. Are you sure you created your account?

auth.title: Use your private key and PIN or log in by
auth.loginPin: Welcome {{accountName}}, use your security PIN to login

input.label: Private key (you saved when creating your account)
input.tooltip: You can use your 12 WORDS too
input.toggle: I want to use the 12 words

input.label: Your 12 words (you saved when creating your account)
input.tooltip: You can use your PRIVATE KEY too
input.toggle: I want to use the Private Key

pin.label: Security PIN (only numbers)
pin.tooltip: The PIN must contain 6 numbers, for your security, enter the PIN you created each time we request it

form.title: Create your Cambiatus account and enjoy our platform

account.label: Create an username with exactly 12 characters
account.tooltip: The username will be as you will be known on the platform by the other participants, it must have exact 12 characters.
account.placeholder: Only letters from a-z and numbers from 1-5

form.accountCharError: Invalid character found. Use only letters and numbers between 1-5
form.pinCharError: Your PIN must use only numbers
form.pinConfirmError: Please enter the same PIN as above

account_error.title: Uoh. Something went wrong while creating your account

account_created.welcome_message: Welcome {{username}}, you will always be able to access Cambiatus with this device in a simple and safe manner, but if you want to use a different computer, smartphone or tablet you will need to have the following information at hand:
account_created.recommendation: We recommend you to save this information by clicking the button below, if you lose it you won't be able to login to your account again
account_created.instructions: You will save the private key and the 12 words on your computer in PDF format.

my_wallet.title: My Wallet
my_wallet.transaction_sent: Your transaction was sent successfully to the blockchain.

transfer.loading_error: Something went wrong while fetching transfers.
transfer.title: Transfer

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.empty: You still don't have any notifications

issue.receive: {{amount}}{{symbol}} has been issued to your account

tooltips.description: Tell us about your community and what problem it is facing.
tooltips.currency_name: A community currency name must be something short, catchy and easy to remember. look for something related with the problem you want to solve.
tooltips.currency_symbol: A symbol is composed by 3 capital letters to identify your currency.
tooltips.invited_reward: This is the amount of token a user receives when they join the system
tooltips.inviter_reward: This is the amount of tokens on receives for inviting another user

edit.title: Edit community
edit.unauthorized: You are not authorized to edit this community

invite.title: Invite your friends

invitation.subtitle: Would you like to join

modal.title: Attention
modal.body: Don't you really want to join the community?

editor.description_placeholder: Set a goal that helps resolve the community problem.

actions.title: Action
actions.loading_error: Something went wrong while fetching actions.
actions.description_label: What actions need to be taken to achieve this goal?
actions.reward_label: The user will earn this reward by completing the action.
actions.verification_label: How this action will be verified?
actions.manually_info: Select people who are really committed to the community.
actions.invite_tooltip: In case the person you wish to invite does not have a Cambiatus account, type his/her email.

form.validation_detail: the action will be available until it is deleted
form.validation_on_detail: the action will be available until a date, quantity or both
form.date_validity_details: the action will end when it reaches a specific date
form.quantity_validity_details: the action will end when it reaches a specific number of usages
form.automatic_detail: rewards the user immediately when claimed
form.manual_detail: rewards the user only after reviewed by others

errors.reward: The reward needs to be more than 0

errors.empty_verifiers: You need at least one verifier if using verifiers
errors.less_verifiers: You need more verifiers for enough votes
errors.minvotes: You need to at least 1 minimum vote if using verifiers
errors.verifier_reward: Verifier reward needs to be atleast 0

form.error: The activity cannot be created. Try later
